OrgName.entry: RETHINK SEVERE MENTAL ILLNESS, SHEFFIELD SUPPORTED HOUSING SERVICE

Desc.entry: Manages 20 self-contained flats across 3 sites in Sheffield with daytime support for people with severe and enduring mental health problems aged 18-65 years. Referral via mental health professionals. Provides an individual support package specifically designed to accommodate individuals' needs. A dedicated housing Community Mental Health Team provides one-to-one support and group work, support in accessing other appropriate services and regular reviews of personal recovery plans.
